awd_titl_txt: First World Congress of Biomechanics; August 26-31, 1990;   La Jolla, CA
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal will provide partial funding for the "1st World                   Congress of Biomechanics".  This new international conference will              provide a useful and coordinated mechanism for the dissemination                of knowledge in this new and growing field of engineering.  Topics              to be covered will include both current research and projections                for future needs and trends in biomechanics research.  It is the                intent of the organizers of this meeting to consolidate the                     various small national and international meetings into a single                 large one, so that an interdisciplinary synergism can enrich the                field of biomechanics.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
